      • loadClientsFromFile

        void loadClientsFromFile(java.lang.String clients_filename,
                         java.lang.String orders_filename)
                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                         ClientFullListException,
                         OrderFullListException,
                         OrderLineFullListException,
                         java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                         ProductNotFoundException,
                         ClientNotFoundException
        Parameters:
        clients_filename - path of the file
        orders_filename - path of the file
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - thrown if the file does not exist
        ClientFullListException - thrown if the list is full
        OrderFullListException - thrown if the list is full
        OrderLineFullListException - thrown if the list is full
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - thrown when number format error happens
        ProductNotFoundException - hrown when the product is not found in the list.
        ClientNotFoundException - Thrown when the client is not found in the list.

      • saveClientsToFile

        void saveClientsToFile(java.lang.String clients_filename,
                       java.lang.String orders_filename)
                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                       java.io.IOException,
                       ClientNotFoundException,
                       OrderNotFoundException,
                       OrderLineNotFoundException
        Parameters:
        clients_filename - file path.
        orders_filename - file path.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Thrown when the file is not found in the list.
        java.io.IOException - ClientNotFoundException
        ClientNotFoundException - Thrown when the client is not in the list.
        OrderNotFoundException - Thrown when order line is not found in the list.
        OrderLineNotFoundException - Thrown when the order is not found in the list.
